None.Name: Blessed Revenant
None.Description:
Summons the
Revenant of a mighty Lost Souls
Demon. The Revenant can be
controlled by the player and is able
to strengthen other friendly Lost Soul
units around him. He will vanish
back into the in between after 25
seconds. Every player can only
summon one demon at a time.
Reusable every 30 seconds.
